meanings.definition: ディンガーン：19世紀のズールー族の王。シャカ王の異母兄弟であり、後継者。
meanings.english_definition: Dingane kaSenzangakhona (c. 1795 – 1840), commonly referred to as Dingaan or Dingane, was a Zulu chief who became king of the Zulu Kingdom in 1828. He set up his capital at Mgungundlovu and was assassinated in 1840.

examples.sentence: Dingaan assassinated his half-brother Shaka to become king.
examples.translation: ディンガーンは王になるために異母兄弟のシャカを暗殺した。

etymology.value: ズールー語起源の名前
